content:
Hi @David Hay ,
Is the clinFhir extension builder operational? I couldn't quite figure out how to use it. I clicked new extension definition in the top right but the pop-up seems unresponsive to several actions (the json tab is blank and extension content is not editable).

Is there a guide somewhere or a recommendation for another tool?

Best,
J

Hi Jay - TBH I haven't really maintained it for a while - I've moved on to using shorthand for any conformance building stuff - check out https://fshschool.org/ for a lot of detail, end there is an on line version at https://fshschool.org/FSHOnline/

I'm embedding FSH deeply into other tools - see http://gb2.clinfhir.com/ as an example...
